A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let me start off by saying that I've been a huge fan since the original films back in the 80s. Unfortnately\, like many of the other fans\, I left the movie somewhat disappointed. I really wanted to like this film and kept waiting and waiting for the movie to get better\, but it just never happened. They just need to reboot the entire star wars series and start off from scratch. I think Disney should try using a darker angle with more Jedis. Thats what I always loved about the movies\, the Jedi and the Jedi battles.
